data.what_is: The only Omni Channel platform that allows you to find, reach out to, and close high-quality B2B clients automatically, all in one place.
data.product_description: The only Omni Channel platform that allows you to find, reach out to, and close high-quality B2B clients automatically, all in one place.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omni.us?
The customer service that was provided was quick, simple, and personalized to meet our needs.  It made learning so much easier for my team.

What do you dislike about Omni.us?
I've not had a negative experience yet.  I'm quite pleased this far!

What problems is Omni.us solving and how is that benefiting you?
It provides us the opportunity to reach more customers.
